page.title: 20Unemployment in Hartlepool
page.content:
Unemployment on a large scale has now become the norm in the town and no longer bears the stigma which was once related to it. Because it is now seen as a permanent feature of the town, the people are now developing a social rather than a career orientated lifestyle.
{CREDITS:- Sara Wheelright, Mark { Elliott, Jayne Berry, Sadi { Thayne, James Hauxwell, { Paula Clemson, Karen Dickson { David Sotheran & Mrs. E. A. { Monaghan, {Lister Street Primary School { HARTLEPOOL, Cleveland.
{Mr. F. Short {Jesmond Road Infant School { HARTLEPOOL, Cleveland.
